backend/main.mo: Main actor for the GameChat AI backend that stores conversation history and generates keyword-based responses about gaming genres, specific games, gaming culture, and game-building payloads.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades stored conversation messages from the old schema (without gamePayload) to the new schema by adding a null gamePayload field to each message.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features—game-payload rendering in MessageBubble/GameRenderer and game-building prompt suggestions in ChatInterface—to their relevant files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference overview of the frontend codebase structure and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders ChatInterface as the sole view of the application.
frontend/src/components/ChatInput.tsx: Auto-resizing textarea input component with Enter-to-send support, a neon-styled send button, and disabled state handling during AI responses.
frontend/src/components/ChatInterface.ts: Main chat layout component featuring a header, scrollable message list, typing indicator, and an empty-state UI with two prompt sections: game-building suggestions and general gaming info prompts.
frontend/src/components/GameRenderer.tsx: Component that parses a backend gamePayload JSON and renders fully self-contained playable mini-games (Snake, Pong, Memory, Breakout, Flappy Bird, Tetris) inside a sandboxed iframe with expand/collapse support.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders a single chat message bubble, styled differently for user vs AI messages, with timestamp formatting and optional embedded game payload via GameRenderer.
Displays an animated three-dot typing indicator with the AI avatar, shown while the AI is generating a response.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Custom hook managing chat state including conversation history, optimistic user message insertion, sending messages, and clearing the conversation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context including login, logout, and identity state via a React context provider and hook built on top of DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching conversation history, sending messages, and clearing local conversation cache using the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers, OKLCH-based dark-mode design tokens, custom neon color variables, and scrollbar styling using Space Grotesk/Mono fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH color tokens, neon glow box shadows, Space Grotesk/Mono fonts, and animation keyframes, with typography and container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the state of the GameChat AI project, including existing features (game rendering in chat, gaming prompt suggestions) and pending feature requests (AI game generation with structured HTML/JS payloads and frontend detection).
